unknown_user.description: Missing user or missing user identifier

ttl_exceeded.description: An authentication token was requested with a TTL larger than the configured maximum value
ttl_exceeded.message: expiresIn value exceeds maximum allowed value

generation_failed.description: Unable to generate the requested authentication token

expired.description: The provided authentication token has expired

verification_error.description: An unexpected error occured while verifying an authentication token

database_inconsistency.description: Inconsistency detected: credentials were found on a non-existing user
database_inconsistency.message: Internal database inconsistency detected: existing credentials found on non-existing user %s.

unauthorized.description: Authentication required to execute this action
unauthorized.message: Unauthorized: authentication required to execute the action "%s:%s".

forbidden.description: Insufficient permissions to execute this action
forbidden.message: Insufficient permissions to execute the action "%s:%s" (User "%s").

already_exists.description: Cannot create the user as it already exists

not_found.description: Attempted to access to a non-existing user

anonymous_profile_required.description: The anonymous user must be assigned to the anonymous profile
anonymous_profile_required.message: The anonymous user must be assigned to the anonymous profile

cannot_hydrate.description: Database inconsistency error: a user is referencing non-existing profiles
cannot_hydrate.message: Unable to hydrate the user "%s": missing profile(s) in the database

uninitialized.description: Attempted to access to an unitialized User object
uninitialized.message: Cannot get profiles for uninitialized user "%s"

prevent_overwrite.description: Attempted to overwrite existing users. Change "onExistingUsers" params to modify this method behavior.

no_profile.description: Database inconsistency error: a user does not have profiles associated to it
no_profile.message: Cannot load user "%s": there is no security profiles associated to it

not_found.description: Attempted to access to a non-existing role

login_required.description: Cannot remove the "login" action from the anonymous role
login_required.message: Cannot remove the "login" action from the anonymous role.

cannot_delete.description: Attempted to delete a base role (anonymous, default, admin)
cannot_delete.message: The following roles are protected and cannot be deleted: anonymous, default, admin

in_use.description: A role still assigned to profiles cannot be deleted
in_use.message: The role "%s" is still used and cannot be deleted.

uninitialized.description: Attempted to access to an unitialized Role object
uninitialized.message: Cannot check permissions on the uninitialized role "%s"

closure_exec_failed.description: Execution failed on the provided closure

closure_missing_test.message: Missing or malformed "test" attribute  for role %s (%s) : %s

unknown_controller.description: Trying to set a role with a non-existing controller
unknown_controller.message: Trying to set role %s with a non-existing controller '%s'. %s

unknown_action.description: Trying to set a role with a non-existing controller action
unknown_action.message: Trying to set role %s with a non-existing action '%s' in controller '%s'. %s

not_found.description: Attempted to access to a non-existing profile

cannot_delete.description: Attempted to delete a base profile (anonymous, default, admin)
cannot_delete.message: The following profiles are protected and cannot be deleted: anonymous, default, admin

in_use.description: A profile still assigned to users cannot be deleted
in_use.message: The profile "%s" is still used and cannot be deleted.

cannot_hydrate.description: Database inconsistency error: a profile is referencing non-existing roles
cannot_hydrate.message: Unable to hydrate the profile "%s": missing role(s) in the database

missing_anonymous_role.description: The anonymous profile must include the anonymous role
missing_anonymous_role.message: The anonymous profile must include the anonymous role

uninitialized.description: Attempted to access to an unitialized Profile object
uninitialized.message: Cannot get roles for uninitialized profile "%s"
